00046 ultimix.wizard._CreateWizardDialogs = function( RawSteps , SuccessFunction , DialogOptions )
00047 {
00048       ultimix.wizard.Steps = RawSteps;
00049       
00050       DialogOptions = jQuery.extend(
00051             {
00052                   width : 640 , 
00053                   height : 480 , 
00054                   modal : true , 
00055                   autoOpen : true , 
00056                   resizable : false , 
00057                   closeOnEscape : false , 
00058                   title : ''
00059             } , 
00060             DialogOptions
00061       );
00062       DialogOptions.autoOpen = false;
00063       if( DialogOptions.title )
00064       {
00065             DialogOptions.title = ultimix.get_string( DialogOptions.title );
00066       }
00067       
00068       for( var i = 0 ; i < ultimix.wizard.Steps.length ; i++ )
00069       {
00070             var         Buttons = new Array();
00071             var         CurrentSelector = ultimix.wizard.Steps[ i ].selector;
00072             
00073             if( i + 1 < ultimix.wizard.Steps.length )
00074             {
00075                   var         CreateNextButton = function( i , CurrentSelector )
00076                   {
00077                         return(
00078                               function()
00079                               {
00080                                     jQuery( CurrentSelector ).dialog( 'close' );
00081                                     jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ i + 1 ].selector ).dialog( 'open' );
00082                                     jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ i + 1 ].selector ).dialog( 'option' , 'title' , DialogOptions.title + ' ' + ultimix.get_string( 'step' ) + ' ' + ( i + 2 ) + ' ' + ultimix.get_string( 'of' ) + ' ' + ultimix.wizard.Steps.length );
00083                               }
00084                         );
00085                   }
00086                   Buttons[ ultimix.get_string( 'Next' ) ] = CreateNextButton( i , CurrentSelector );
00087             }
00088             
00089             if( i + 1 == ultimix.wizard.Steps.length )
00090             {
00091                   var         CreateFinishButton = function( i , CurrentSelector )
00092                   {
00093                         return(
00094                               function()
00095                               {
00096                                     SuccessFunction();
00097                                     jQuery( CurrentSelector ).dialog( 'close' );
00098                               }
00099                         );
00100                   }
00101                   Buttons[ ultimix.get_string( 'Finish' ) ] = CreateFinishButton( i , CurrentSelector );
00102             }
00103             
00104             if( i > 0 )
00105             {
00106                   var         CreateBackButton = function( i , CurrentSelector )
00107                   {
00108                         return(
00109                               function()
00110                               {
00111                                     jQuery( CurrentSelector ).dialog( 'close' );
00112                                     jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ i - 1 ].selector ).dialog( 'open' );
00113                                     jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ i - 1 ].selector ).dialog( 'option' , 'title' , DialogOptions.title + ' ' + ultimix.get_string( 'step' ) + ' ' + i + ' ' + ultimix.get_string( 'of' ) + ' ' + ultimix.wizard.Steps.length );
00114                               }
00115                         );
00116                   }
00117                   Buttons[ ultimix.get_string( 'Back' ) ] = CreateBackButton( i , CurrentSelector );
00118             }
00119             
00120             var         CreateCancelButton = function( CurrentSelector )
00121             {
00122                   return(
00123                         function()
00124                         {
00125                               jQuery( CurrentSelector ).dialog( 'close' );
00126                         }
00127                   );
00128             };
00129             Buttons[ ultimix.get_string( 'Cancel' ) ] = CreateCancelButton( CurrentSelector );
00130             
00131             DialogOptions.buttons = Buttons;
00132             
00133             jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ i ].selector ).dialog( DialogOptions );
00134       }
00135 }

00148 ultimix.wizard.Wizard = function( RawSteps , SuccessFunction , DialogOptions )
00149 {
00150       ultimix.wizard.CurrentStep = -1;
00151       
00152       ultimix.wizard._CreateWizardDialogs( RawSteps , SuccessFunction , DialogOptions );
00153       
00154       jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ 0 ].selector ).dialog( 'open' );
00155       
00156       jQuery( ultimix.wizard.Steps[ 0 ].selector ).dialog( 'option' , 'title' , DialogOptions.title + ' ' + ultimix.get_string( 'step' ) + ' ' + 1 + ' ' + ultimix.get_string( 'of' ) + ' ' + ultimix.wizard.Steps.length );
00157 }
